sqlList.sql: SELECT lm.ID, lm.ID AS REGCHANELID,lm.regchanel_code AS REGchanelcode,lm.regchanel_name AS REGchanelnm, lm.status AS ONLINESTATUS, (CASE lm.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS， lm.create_time AS CDTIME, lm.update_time AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_regchanel lm where ((:REGCHANELNAME IS NULL) OR (lm.regchanel_name LIKE '%'||:REGCHANELNAME||'%')) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (lm.status=:ONLINESTATUS)) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= lm.create_time)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (lm.create_time <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) ORDER BY lm.ID DESC
select lm.regchanel_code AS REGCHANELCODE,lm.regchanel_name AS REGCHANELNM from t_lm_b_regchanel lm where (lm.regchanel_code = :REGCHANELCODE) OR (lm.regchanel_name = :REGCHANELNM)
select lm.regchanel_code AS REGCHANELCODE,lm.regchanel_name AS REGCHANELNM from t_lm_b_regchanel lm where (lm.regchanel_code <> :REGCHANELCODE) AND (lm.regchanel_name = :REGCHANELNM)
INSERT INTO t_lm_b_regchanel(ID, regchanel_code, regchanel_name, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (:ID, :REGCHANELCODE, :REGCHANELNM, '0',SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
UPDATE t_lm_b_regchanel SET regchanel_name=:REGCHANELNM,status=:ONLINESTATUS, update_time=SYSDATE WHERE regchanel_code=:ID
select ID, REGCHANELCODE, REGCHANELNM, REGCHANELNM||'('||REGCHANELCODE||')' AS DISPLAYNM from T_LM_REGCHANEL

SELECT cs.ID, lm.ID AS REGCHANELID,lm.REGchanelcode,lm.REGchanelnm, cs.ONLINESTATUS, (CASE cs.ONLINESTATUS WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS， cs.CDTIME, cs.UDTIME from T_CS_REGCHANEL cs inner join T_LM_REGCHANEL lm on cs.REGchanelid=lm.id where ((:REGCHANELNAME IS NULL) OR (lm.regchanelnm LIKE '%'||:REGCHANELNAME||'%')) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (cs.ONLINESTATUS=:ONLINESTATUS)) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= cs.CDTIME)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (cs.CDTIME <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) ORDER BY lm.ID DESC
SELECT ID, REGCHANELID, ONLINESTATUS, CDTIME, UDTIME from T_CS_REGCHANEL WHERE REGCHANELCODE=:REGCHANELCODE
select lm.REGCHANELCODE,lm.REGCHANELNM from t_lm_regchanel lm where (lm.REGCHANELCODE = :REGCHANELCODE) OR (lm.REGCHANELNM = :REGCHANELNM)
select lm.REGCHANELCODE,lm.REGCHANELNM from t_lm_regchanel lm where (lm.REGCHANELCODE <> :REGCHANELCODE) AND (lm.REGCHANELNM = :REGCHANELNM)
INSERT INTO T_CS_REGCHANEL(ID, REGCHANELID, ONLINESTATUS, CDTIME, UDTIME) VALUES (:ID, :REGCHANELID, :ONLINESTATUS, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO T_LM_REGCHANEL(ID, REGCHANELCODE, REGCHANELNM, CDTIME, UDTIME) VALUES (:ID, :REGCHANELCODE, :REGCHANELNM, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
UPDATE T_CS_REGCHANEL SET ONLINESTATUS=:ONLINESTATUS, UDTIME=SYSDATE WHERE ID=:ID
UPDATE t_lm_regchanel SET REGCHANELNM=:REGCHANELNM, UDTIME=SYSDATE WHERE REGCHANELCODE=:REGCHANELCODE
